titles.title: A bill relating to the tariff treatment of certain telescopes not designed for use with infra-red light.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Executive Comment Requested from State, Treasury, Commerce, Labor, ITC, USTR.
Executive Comment Received From ITC, Commerce.

bill.summary: 2/25/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide duty-free treatment of telescopic sights for rifles valued at not over $50 and of other types of telescopic sights valued at not over $200. Provides staged rate reductions for other types of telescopic sights valued at over $200.
